description.short:
thanks for sharing, I took a few pieces from this to see if I can merge it with the ash hexagon app and created this mutant of an app 😄 

I'll figure out how the controls and colors work in the future 😅 

Video = https://discord.com/channels/958209073277456457/1031058655581323324/1338863597832638487
description.raw_message_content:
thanks for sharing, I took a few pieces from this to see if I can merge it with the ash hexagon app and created this mutant of an app 😄 

I'll figure out how the controls and colors work in the future 😅

ai.description: Renders a hexagonal floor tile grid as a 3D model, merging pieces from an existing hexagon app. Generates tiled hex geometry for use as a modular environment building block in virtual worlds.
